metadata.title: CVE-2017-18188 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: OpenRC opentmpfiles through 0.1.3, when the fs.protected_hardlinks sysctl is turned off, allows local users to obtain ownership of arbitrary files by creating a hard link inside a directory on which "chown -R" will be run.

criterions.comment: opentmpfiles package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
